short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to pick data from web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Often link previews (title, og:... properties,...) don't fetch the data really needed when collecting URLs while researching the Web. Titles contain search engine optimized suffixes, images don't represent the actual content, account managed pages are not accessible by the service,... .
This extension helps you to quickly select the necessary data from an open web page and lets you copy the results as JSON, CSV line or Markdown into your clipboard.
